ABOUT US

Welcome to INTTIZO — Where Design Meets Intention

INTTIZO is a modern design platform committed to crafting refined, functional, and aesthetically timeless spaces. With a passion for minimalism and meaningful detail, we specialize in interiors and architectural concepts that elevate everyday living.

Whether it's a personal residence or a commercial vision, we approach each project with a deep respect for clarity, comfort, and creativity — shaping environments that not only look stunning but feel purposeful.

Every project we take on reflects our core philosophy — simplicity with soul. Whether it's a residential transformation or a commercial concept, our work is a reflection of balance, creativity, and meticulous craftsmanship.

Read More
What we do?

Crafting Experiences Through Design

At INTTIZO, we believe in the power of design to transform lives. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and client satisfaction sets us apart.

Interior Design & Styling

Thoughtful, clean, and expressive interiors built around your lifestyle and brand identity.

Spatial Planning & Architecture

Efficient, harmonious layouts that prioritize light, space, and flow.

Material & Concept Curation

From textures to tones, every material is handpicked to evoke elegance and comfort.

Our Category

Spaces Designed for Living

Browse our category-wise interiors, thoughtfully crafted for comfort, beauty, and purpose—every room, a reflection of timeless style and intentional design.

Living Room

The living room is your home's statement. We design it to reflect you—through bold materials, modular comfort, and curated accents. INTTIZO turns everyday spaces into effortlessly stylish experiences.

Read More

Modular Kitchen

Where smart design meets daily rhythm—our modular kitchens are crafted to flow with your lifestyle. INTTIZO blends precision detailing, quality textures, and custom layouts to redefine how you cook, store, and live.

Read More

Modular Wardrobe

Designed to organize without compromise. INTTIZO’s modular wardrobes are more than storage—they're sculpted with precision, tailored to your needs, and crafted using rich finishes and durable systems that last.

Read More

Bedroom

Drift into luxury with bedrooms curated for deep comfort and timeless style. At INTTIZO, we craft personalized sanctuaries with premium materials, thoughtful storage, and finishes that feel as good as they look.

Read More

Office Furniture

Function meets finesse with INTTIZO’s custom office furniture. Engineered for long hours and lasting impressions, each piece is designed to enhance posture, productivity, and the professional aesthetic of your workspace.

Read More

Bathroom Vanities

Crafted for calm and built to last—our bathroom vanities bring elegance to the essentials. From moisture-resistant finishes to smart compartments, INTTIZO delivers beauty that works behind the scenes.

Read More
